newsitem.title: USA: CCC seeks 23,500 tonnes U.S. wheat for Honduras.
newsitem.headline: CCC seeks 23,500 tonnes U.S. wheat for Honduras.

text.p: The Commodity Credit Corp said it is seeking a total of 23,500 tonnes of U.S. wheat under the export donation program to Honduras.
The deal includes 5,000 tonnes northern spring/dark northern spring wheat and 3,000 tonnes soft red winter wheat set for November 1-25 shipment.
It also includes 9,500 NS/DNS wheat and 6,000 tonnes SRW wheat slated for December 10-30 shipment.
The CCC, which is part of the U.S. Department of Agriculture, said offers are due on September 11.
